page.title: 12Playtime Games Continued
page.content: twist the elastic round your ankles, then jump up and land with your legs either side.Next take one one side of the elastic over,stand on it,then jump up and land on both.Repeat this on knees.On the next stage the elastic is on two legs again.First you jump into the middle and out.Then you jump on to one side and then on to the other.Next you take one side of the elastic over as before,but this time you jump on to the opposite side.Repeat this on knees and thighs.On the next stage you hop, you aren't allowed to put your foot down.You do the same as on the stage before.You repeat this on knees.If you finish this you can go through it again,but this the people standing in move.Perhaps you can make up some stages of your own.
